IP2Location.DatabasePathDescription: The absolute path to the directory that stores the BIN file.
IP2Location.DownloadTokenDescription: You can get your download token at "Download Section" after login into %1$sIP2Location LITE%2$s or %3$sIP2Location Commercial%4$s website.
IP2Location.GeolocationAPIServiceDescription: Register to get free API key at %1$shttps://www.ip2location.io/%2$s. 50,000 free queries every month
IP2Location.GeolocationAPIServiceHasBeenSaved: Geolocation API Service has been saved.
IP2Location.IP2LocationBINDatabaseDescription: Register to download free database at %1$shttps://lite.ip2location.com/%2$s.
IP2Location.IP2LocationBINDatabaseDescriptionCommerc: Commercial database with high accuracy available at %1$shttps://www.ip2location.com/%2$s.
IP2Location.LocationProviderDescription: This location provider uses %1$sIP2Location%2$s BIN database or %3$sIP2Location.io%4$s Geolocation API Service for geolocation lookup.
IP2Location.LocationProviderInstallDocs: Please go to %1$sSystem → IP2Location%2$s to configure this location provider.
IP2Location.LookupModeWarning: Please select one of the lookup mode to get started.
IP2Location.NoIP2LocationDatabaseFile: There is no IP2Location BIN database file found. Please insert your %1$sDownload Token%2$s below to download your BIN database.
IP2Location.ScheduledTaskDescription: You also can run task manually using:
